title: black screen after champ select
body: the title says it all. every game I try to play it always shows up as a black screen when trying to load into summoners rift..i already tried to repair the client and I checked my firewall.

replies.body: I don't hear anything any the only thing that changes is when I click on it it tells me it isn't responding. if I exit out of it I get the option to reconnect but when I do I just go straight black to a black screen

It definitely sounds like you're experiencing this issue due to an *unstable connection* to our gameservers. Our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) will walk you through the solutions I recommend you test, as they'll ensure your network settings are compatible with League.

Let me know if this resolved the issue for you.

Do you hear any sounds going on while you see the black screen or do you eventually see a "network connection" error with an option to reconnect? A few more details will help me undertand what's going on.
I have the same thing happening, I get to the game loading screen after champ select and black screen, I load game and hear the sounds, but no visual.
